Polls Module

polls.views.detail(request, question_id)[source]

Display the details of a particular question.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • question_id (int) – The ID of the question to display.

Returns:

The rendered detail page for the specified question.

Return type:

HttpResponse

polls.views.index(request)[source]

Display the latest five questions in the poll application.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

The rendered poll page with the latest questions.

Return type:

HttpResponse

polls.views.results(request, question_id)[source]

Display the results of a particular question.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • question_id (int) – The ID of the question for which to display results.

Returns:

The rendered results page for the specified question.

Return type:

HttpResponse

polls.views.vote(request, question_id)[source]

Process a vote for a particular question.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • question_id (int) – The ID of the question being voted on.

Returns:

  • HttpResponseRedirect – Redirects to the results page after a successful vote.

  • HttpResponse – The rendered voting form page with an error message if no choice was selected.
